official_title: To name the national aviation center operated by the United States Customs Service as the "Glenn English Customs National Aviation Center".

summary.text: Declares that the national aviation center operated by the U.S. Customs Service at 5020 South Meridian Avenue in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, shall be known as the Glenn English Customs National Aviation Center.

titles.title: To name the national aviation center operated by the United States Customs Service as the "Glenn English Customs National Aviation Center".
